title: (x) tech sans on www.sigarett.com - FF Dax {Rainer}
content:
Can anyone tell me what font they are using for their titles and logo? It looks a little like the Neotech family and a few others like leitura, but there are subtle differences. Such as the ’a’. Any help identifying this font would be appreciated.

Thanks

 [‹ (x) Geometric display face, similar to Parkitecture by Jeff Levine - Disco Deck {Rainer}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121428/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35968 "Go to previous forum topic") [National Treasure II square font w/ small slab serifs ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121428/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35752 "Go to next forum topic")
author: r0b

comments.content: And finally see what bizarre fights Hans Reichel has to fight against some taxmen. Story from [Fontblog](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121428/http:/www.fontblog.de/hans-reichel-kaempft-gegen-das-finanzamt). (Sorry only in german)

Thanks so much Renko!

Translating the blog now. :)
